sentences.sContent: It is this "humanness" of the gorilla which is so beguiling.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is this "humanness" of the gorilla which is so beguiling.
sentences.sCn: 就是大猩猩的这种“人的特性”使人感到如此有趣。

sentences.sContent: He offers the mime a job to dress up as the gorilla until they can get another one.
sentences.sContent_eng: He offers the mime a job to dress up as the gorilla until they can get another one.
sentences.sCn: 他主动提供一个工作给这个哑剧演员，装扮成一只大猩猩直到他们能找到另一只真的。

sentences.sContent: I knew something about the gorilla sanctuary among the volcanoes, but had never planned to go there.
sentences.sContent_eng: I knew something about the gorilla sanctuary among the volcanoes, but had never planned to go there.
sentences.sCn: 我知道一些在火山一带的大猩猩保护区的情况，但从未打算到那儿去。

remMethod.val: go(去) + rill(小河) + a → 到小河边去看大猩猩 → 大猩猩

trans.tranOther: a very large African monkey that is the largest of the  apes
